name: Run and Jump - Final release
description:
Hey y'all!

This is the final iteration of my game for the 11DTG course. I'd like for you to test it out and fill out the google form linked in the description of the game. The game is only available on Windows so sorry for any inconveniences. 

The file is an application and then the game should run. If you could spend sometime playing the game and maybe even looking at all the features and etc that would be great. You do not have to finish the game but try your best. Once you are done, it would be great if you could fill in the form below. I hope you enjoy the game and please give your honest opinion (even if it's toxic).  

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/5GLcVs6337XYH2817

The first two versions are also available if you would like to try. 

 Game (Version 1): https://20582.itch.io/sprint1 

 Game (Version 2): https://20582.itch.io/run-and-jump 

 Thank you for your understanding.

Controls

WASD & Arrow Keys - Movement (forwards, left, back, right)

Spacebar - Jump 

Esc - Pause
